no_hardcoded_secrets.description: Never commit API keys, passwords, or secrets directly in code.

validate_inputs.description: Always validate and sanitize user input to prevent injection attacks.

avoid_nested_loops.description: Nested loops can lead to performance bottlenecks.

prefer_list_comprehension.description: List comprehensions are usually faster and more Pythonic than loops.

enforce_pep8.description: Follow PEP8 guidelines for readability and consistency.

max_line_length.description: Keep lines under 100 characters for readability.

require_docstrings.description: Public classes and functions should include docstrings.

limit_function_length.description: Functions should not exceed 50 lines to stay maintainable.

avoid_large_classes.description: Classes over 500 lines are hard to maintain.

require_unit_tests.description: All new features and bug fixes should include unit tests.
